settings.Imgsub_heading: HyperDrive Next is a game-changing line of connectivity solutions that redefines performance and data transfer speeds, encouraging users to go beyond their devices' boundaries and embrace innovation.

settings.image_heading: Uphold the Planet With Sustainable Materials
settings.Imgsub_heading: HyperDrive Next represents a revolutionary advancement in technology, seamlessly blending sustainability with high-speed connectivity through EcoSmart™ products that are made from recycled materials and designed to reduce the environmental impact.

settings.image_heading: Shape Your Vision with Unmatched Performance
settings.Imgsub_heading: Unleash creativity and productivity with unparalleled file transfer speed and seamless compatibility. From USB4 NVMe SSD Enclosure to Dual 4K HDMI 7 Port USB-C Hub, experience faster transfers, 40% more power, and eco-conscious design. Work anywhere, create everywhere with HyperDrive Next.

settings.betterycontent: Get faster data transfer, unmatched performance, and next-gen capabilities.
Charge devices while you work with 40% more power using 140W PD3.1.
Transfer photo and video files 3x faster by upgrading to SD 4.0.

settings.heading: Work Anywhere with Pro-grade Ports and Dual 4K Monitors for Any Device
settings.description: Wherever your creativity takes you, the HyperDrive Next 10 Port Business Class USB-C Docking Station follows. Dual 4K monitor support for PC, Mac, and Chromebook - check. 10Gbps USB ports for 2X faster file transfers - check. SD 4.0 for 3X faster photo and video transfers - check. A detachable USB-C cable - check.

settings.heading: Create Anywhere with Superior Speed
settings.description: Unleash your creative prowess with the HyperDrive Next USB-C Hubs, ranging from 4 to 11 ports of sheer potential. 10Gb USB transfers, SD 4.0 with three times the data transfer rates at 312Mbs, and 40% more pass-through power with a 140W PD 3.1 passthrough port. Our hubs, forged from 85% recycled plastic and 100% recycled aluminum, make creativity and sustainability inseparable allies.

settings.heading: Work Directly From Your SSD
settings.description: Step into a realm of unparalleled file transfer speed with the HyperDrive Next USB4 NVMe SSD Enclosure. Soar with 40Gbps transfer rates, editing directly from your SSD. This seamless compatibility with M.2 NVMe SSDs and storage capacity of up to 4TB is housed in EcoSmart™ Sustainability with 100% recycled aluminum gives you an IP55 rating for reliable water and dust resistance.

settings.heading: Get Dual Extended Monitors for M1 & M2 MacBooks
settings.description: Elevate your creative potential with the HyperDrive® Next Dual 4K HDMI 7 Port USB-C Hub. Empower your M1 & M2 MacBooks by extending dual monitors for a productivity boost. Speed up your workflow with 10Gbps USB ports for 2X faster file transfers and the 100W PD power pass-through port. Crafted with 85% recycled plastics, it's our commitment to sustainability in every pixel. Get all the great benefits of M1 & M2 dual monitor connectivity, with our best value yet for a dual monitor hub for M1 & M2 at $149.99.
